data.excerpt: miniVolts is an Arduino powered RC car and controlled by Android Application.

content.content: miniVolts is an Arduino powered RC car and controlled by Android Application. I worked on both hardware and software part with Shubam Joshi, Romit Khanal, Rupesh Ghimire.
